name: employeeExperience_CreateLearningProviders
description: Create a new learningProvider object and register it with Viva Learning using the specified display name and logos for different themes.

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**displayName**: The display name that appears in Viva Learning. Required.
**isEnabled**: The state of the provider. Optional.
**learningContents**: Learning catalog items for the provider.
**loginWebUrl**: Authentication URL to access the courses for the provider. Optional.

**longLogoWebUrlForDarkTheme**: The long logo URL for the dark mode, which needs to be a publicly accessible image. This image would be saved to the Blob storage of Viva Learning for rendering within the Viva Learning app. Required.

**longLogoWebUrlForLightTheme**: The long logo URL for the light mode, which needs to be a publicly accessible image. This image would be saved to the Blob storage of Viva Learning for rendering  within the Viva Learning app. Required.

**squareLogoWebUrlForDarkTheme**: The square logo URL for the dark mode, which needs to be a publicly accessible image. This image would be saved to the Blob storage of Viva Learning for rendering within the Viva Learning app. Required.

**squareLogoWebUrlForLightTheme**: The square logo URL for the light mode, which needs to be a publicly accessible image. This image would be saved to the Blob storage of Viva Learning for rendering within the Viva Learning app. Required.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
